explains: n. 呼吸者；呼吸的东西；剧烈的运动；短时间的休息
wordGroup: breather valve 呼吸阀；通气阀

sentences.en: Tell me when you need a breather.
sentences.cn: 你需要休息时就告诉我。

sentences.en: Relax and take a breather whenever you feel that you need one.
sentences.cn: 放松,你什么时候需要休息就歇一下。

sentences.en: It would be nice to get a breather.
sentences.cn: 要是能有个喘息时间就好了。
